**Shared Hosting Features**
- Fast Pure SSD Storage;
- Powered by Plesk Control Panel;
- Powered by CloudLinux;
- WordPress Toolkit;
- Free SSL Powered by Let's Encrypt for all domains and sub-domains;
- Auto update of WordPress software and WordPress plugins;
- Auto security enhancement of WordPress;
- Free IPv6 address per hosting account;
- Anti DDoS Protection;
- PHP Selector;
- PHP Composer enabled;
- Node.js enabled;
- Ruby enabled;
- Nginx caching enabled;
- Web Application Firewall;
- Free Website Migration;
- Daily / Weekly / Monthly Backups;
- We can help you migrate your website to our service!

**Some reasons to use our VPS services:**
- We have a 99.9% uptime guarantee, as we know how to manager service and servers for last 10 years.
- Anti-DDoS Protection.
- Control panels and special server management available.
- We help you to provision your VPS account.
- Virtual private server activation is not instant, but it's usually setup and ready the same day, all server resources are available to provision if the item in stock.
- We are not Apple to generate interest without having stock to sell.
- We do not oversell resources.
- We offer a full 14-day money back guarantee*, if you change your mind for any reason.
- Pay by card or bank transfer transfer;
- After the 14 days, you can still cancel as our plans are monthly rolling.
- We offer better specs on our VPS services than our competitors
